meanings: (글·글씨 등을) write, (시·편지 등을) compose, (적다) put[write] (sth) down, (간단히) jot sth down

vlive.korean: 뭐 쓰지? What should I write? 듣기 View video OSEN : Stray KIds 스트레이키즈가 폭로한 현진의 잠버릇은? #스타로드 9
음... 뭐라고 쓰지? What shall I write? 듣기 View video Dispatch : [Dicon] "미나’s Special Day" (디아이콘 : 트와이스)
"오늘은은 쓰지 말라고" - 근데 그거 알아요? "Don't start your diary with today". - Do you know what? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 막내의 사생활 23 (생일 기념❤)🦊
vlive.english: "Don't start your diary with today". - Do you know what?

vlive.korean: [3. 원스를 위한 부적 멘트 고민] 뭐 쓰지? [3. Thinking about what to write for ONCE] What should I write? 듣기 View video Dispatch : [Dicon] “쯔위’s Special Day” (디아이콘 : 트와이스)
vlive.english: [3. Thinking about what to write for ONCE] What should I write?

vlive.korean: 따로 다른 섀도 쓰지 않고 여기 아트클래쓰에 있는 제일 진한색 있죠? I won't use a separate shadow. There's the darkest color on the Art Class, right? 듣기 View video EMMA BEAUTY : [Vietnam GRWM+VLOG] 베트남에서 같이 준비해요♥ 꾸안꾸 메이크업!
vlive.english: I won't use a separate shadow. There's the darkest color on the Art Class, right?

examples.korean: vegetables grown without the use of pesticides 듣기 Add to Wordbook 농약을 쓰지 않고 기른 채소 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: Memory can atrophy through lack of use. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 기억력은 쓰지 않으면 퇴화될 수 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Memory can atrophy through lack of use. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The fire was allowed to burn unchecked. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 불은 손을 쓰지 못해 제멋대로 타오르고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The fire was allowed to burn unchecked. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The room smelt of disuse and mouldering books. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 방은 쓰지 않고 묵혀 둔 냄새와 썩어 가는 책 냄새가 났다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The room smelt of disuse and mouldering books. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Use illustrations where appropriate but don’t overdo it. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 삽화는 적절히 쓰되 너무 많이 쓰지는 마세요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
